txt.en: Cold grims haunt the Father's Path high in the Welkin-lofts.

'You cleared away the ice grims that threaten the path up the mountain? Good! I thought I felt it getting a little warmer!\n\n'Brrrr, the wind returns. Perhaps it was just my imagination. Still, you did good work against those grims, [placeholder]!'
Defeat ice grims in the Welkin-lofts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ice grims can be found on the cliffs near Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold.\n\nYou should defeat ice grims.
Kyrstig can be found near Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold.\n\nYou should talk to Kyrstig.

'We're very high up in the mountains now. A cold wind blows, and it brings with it grims and other fell spirits. You'll see them if you continue up the Father's Path. The grims make the freezing cold even deadlier, and it's not as if this environment was very pleasant before!\n\n'These are not conditions we will want our reinforcements to deal with on their way to the peak. We should do something about those grims, [placeholder].'
Defeated ice grims in the Welkin-lofts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
